Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
how long does it take for new ads to get approved?

Hey Frank, the ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days. Sometimes it can be even quicker thanks to our awesome Ad Ops team! For more details, you can check out this article: [How to create your first ad](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17618196971149-How-to-create-your-first-ad).
do I have to be approved for creating a first time  new account?
Hi Frank, you don't need any special approval to create a new account for the first time. You can go ahead and sign up directly. If you have any issues or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
why are my ads still showing as pending after almost 2 weeks?>

Hi Frank, I'm sorry to hear that your ads are still pending after almost 2 weeks. This is definitely longer than usual. There might be an issue with the ad content or a technical glitch. I recommend checking if your ad adheres to NewsBreakâ€™s policies and guidelines. You can find more information here: [My ad got rejected - What's next](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next). If everything seems fine, it might be best to contact support for further assistance.
Connecting you to a live agent. Please hold.
